titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning prayer ex tempore, or, by pretence of the spirit. In justification of authorized and set-formes of lyturgie.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning prayer ex tempore, or, by pretence of the spirit. In justification of authorized and set-formes of lyturgie.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeere, M DC XLVI. [1646]

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Jeremy Taylor by Wing.
The roman numeral date in the imprint is made with turned c's.
In this edition, "spirit" in line 6 of the title is followed by a period; variations in text between editions begin on page 35 (cf. McAlpin Collection Catalogue, v.2 p.453).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "by Dr Tailour"; "Dec 6th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
